file_content.text: For the Brentaal Star--attack! For the Republic!
You're speaking to a Special Forces commander, meat. Show some respect.
So--you think you're tough meat? Ha! Part of me was hoping you'd try to board this ship.
I'm not interested in your bluster. Give me the general.
You should be worrying about yourself--leave the general to wiser heads.
Special Forces Commander Ghulil--honored hero of the Dac Military Academy. The sentient who's going to remove you from this ship.
I'm heading toward your position now. Special Forces will guard your retreat, but you must keep moving!
The general is safe with me. You should look after your own men.
We all know our duty. Go! All forces open fire! Open fire!
We have to keep moving, General. There's a medpac in the escape pod. Just a little farther....
May the Force be with you, Commander.
Go. Go now! I'll hold off the Imperials.
